text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh? So this is camp, huh? Not bad.<n>Kinda got a nice vibe to it.
I bet it'd<n>make for a good photo shoot location!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yep. Fashionably late, but, we can<n>make up for lost time,
yeah?

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
Hello, Trainer. I'm sorry she couldn't<n>be here
earlier—schedules didn't quite<n>work out.
choice_data_list: No worries. Just glad she could make it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Right, I'm gonna drop my stuff off<n>and get changed.
choice_data_list: See you on the beach in twenty!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Excuuuse me? I'll be ready in ten.<n>Don't underestimate
how fast models<n>can get changed.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City! Make sure to wear plenty of<n>sunscreen, okay?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, don't need to tell me<n>twice!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And with that, Gold City's summer<n>training begins.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
We're all supposed to cook today?<n>Huh? I've barely ever
held a pan.<n>Whoa, nope, nope, nope!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
You'll be fine! Just calm down. You<n>know, I've never seen
you in such a<n>panic before. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: City! C'mon, it's a beautiful morning<n>for training!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ughhh, I'm so done. Anything but<n>early mornings... Nope, not
happening.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: All right, one more race! And this time<n>I'm winning!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume C
text_block_list.text:
You're on, but I'm not losing. I'll bet<n>you three premium
carrots.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Someone's feeling feisty! I'm in!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After dinner, Gold City comes up to<n>me and says she wants
to talk<n>outside.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You know, I'd just about given up on<n>coming here. With
work and more<n>work, it wasn't looking like I could<n>make
it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But, you helped me figure out a<n>schedule, and I told my
manager how I<n>feel... And, well, here I am.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, me too. Really, I am... Before, I<n>probably would've
just gotten pissed<n>and complained about it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh my gosh! Can you not?! But, well...<n>I'm thankful, you
know.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I got here late, but you've kept me<n>busy, and I've gotten a
chance to<n>know the others.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
No one's quite what they seem, are<n>they? I guess I was
judging others by<n>what was on the surface, too.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, apparently there's going to<n>be like a festival
nearby. Want to<n>check it out? I bet we'll see a lot of<n>
different faces!

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's City! She's so pretty!

text_block_list.name: Fan
text_block_list.text: I, um... I-I'm a big fan!

text_block_list.name: Stall Staff
text_block_list.text: Here, take one. They're delicious!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's popular, all right. You can tell<n>she's used to the
attention by the<n>way she smiles at the people who<n>come
up to her.

text_block_list.name: Boy
text_block_list.text: City, you're the best.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Thanks. I'd be really happy if you'd<n>watch me race too.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...Heh, didn't think so many people<n>would recognize me
here. Kinda funny.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Which labor—modeling or racing?<n>Hard to tell which one
they're talking<n>about. All I really want people to<n>notice is
my running.
choice_data_list: Maybe your modeling can help your running.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? As if.
choice_data_list: Why don't you go for a run and find out?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Go for a run? Wait, like now?!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Sooo why exactly did you drag meout of the festival for this? I swear, Iam never going to get you.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Hello?! Ugh, fine, whatever. Okay,<n>here I go...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She kicks up a sandstorm across the<n>beach!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Phew... My time? Yep, about what I<n>expected.
choice_data_list:
Now go again, but hear your fans cheering you
on.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? As if that's gonna change<n>anything. Whatever, here
goes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She gives it another go, but this time...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Ugh, don't you ever get tired?<n>Oh wait, back at the
festival...

text_block_list.name: Boy
text_block_list.text: City, you're the best.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...I got this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Something lights a fire under her feet,<n>and...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Done!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She sets a new personal best for the<n>summer.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew. You remindedme of that kid from the festival, andthen my legs... they just, like, surgedahead.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
What, like they give me the power to<n>go that extra distance?
Well, in that<n>case...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
What if I... take all the fans of my<n>modeling work, and get
them to come<n>to my races?
choice_data_list: The stands will be roaring for you!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Geez, manipulative much? Using myfans like that. I knew there wasan evil mastermind behind the mask.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But... Heh. I like it. Most of my fans<n>only know me as a
model, and now I<n>can show them what I'm like on the<n>turf.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Then they'll see I'm not just some<n>pretty doll—I'm a
champion!
choice_data_list: Run two roads, you get double the mileage.
Run two roads, you get double the mileage.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...Okay, okay, you got me on board. If I<n>want to win, I'll need
you anyway.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: So, uh... Let's keep it up, yeah?<n>Partner.
